english.segment1: Takin' time to realize. I was wrong, you were never gone. When you fell, you fell on me
english.segment2: Can I be close to you-yeah. Can I just touch you lord
english.segment3: (Chorus). You reveal yourself to me. You reveal yourself to me
english.segment4: I in you, you my King. This gift of melody I bring. Forever true, you will be, you will be
english.segment5: Can I be close to you-yeah. Can I just touch you lord
english.segment7: Lord here I am, I'm waiting for you to come. Lord here I am, come and take my soul. Come and take everything
